src_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ref_text: Hi Musumbhunuku, Sara Danius, matsalana wa nkarhi hinkwawo wa Komiti ya Nobel eka Matsalwa le Swedish Academy, u tivise erivaleni eka nongonoko wa xiyanimoya eka Sveriges Radio le Sweden a vula leswaku komiti, tanihi leswi a yi nga swi koti ku fikelela Bob Dylan hi ku kongoma malunghana ni ku hlula kakwe Sagwadi ra Nobel eka Matsalwa hi 2016, yi tshikile matshalatshala lawa a yi ma endla yo n’wi kuma.
hyp_text: Munyori wa Lunesu, Sara Danius, setshiselo sa sekretari sa komiti yo hleki ya Literature ya Nobel ku Academy ya Sweden, wava ku tala eka radio program wa Sveriges Radio ku Sweden, komiti, ha kona kona kona kona ku tala Bob Dylan ke ya tlhaka ya 2016 ya Nobel Prize ya Literature, ha kona kona kona ku tala eka hleki.

src_text: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref_text: “Ku cincacinca ka maxelo ya wona a ku endleki hakatsongo-tsongo ku fana ni ka mabako lamakulu eka pulanete ya Misava lama hakanyingi ma vaka ni maxelo lama nga cinciki, kambe ma fambisana tanihi leswi mabako lawa ma nga migodi yo enta swinene emisaveni,” ku vule Glen Cushing wa United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team ni wa Yunivhesiti ya Northern Arizona leyi nga eFlagstaff, le Arizona.
hyp_text: Hlava ya thermal yin'wana ke lebyi na lebyi ku yin'wana ke lebyi ku hlahlwa hi ku vutlhari bya ku kona, kelebyi ku hlahlwa hi ku hlahlwa hi ku vutlhari bya ku kona, ngopfuwa na Glen Cushing wa Makhaya wa USGS wa Astrogeology Team na wa University ya Arizona ya Borwa, e Flagstaff, Arizona.

src_text: He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."

src_text: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
ref_text: Nkarhi wa Mifumo Minharhu i un’wana wa minkarhi lowu halateke ngati yo tala swinene eka matimu ya Chayina ya khale, ku fe vanhu va magidi va lwela ku fuma a xigodlhweni lexikulu a Xi’an.

src_text: One of the most noteworthy recent examples of this was the North Atlantic campaign of WWII. The Americans were trying to move men and materials across the Atlantic Ocean to help Britain.
ref_text: Xin’wana xa xikombiso xa sweswi lexi xiyekaka i xa tsima ra Atlantiki N’walungu ra Nyimpi ya Vumbirhi ya Misava. Maamerika a va ringeta ku susa vavanuna ni switirho ku tsemakanya Lwandle-nkulu ra Atlantiki leswaku va pfuna Britain.
hyp_text: Tiko ra vha tsha tshelele ya leta, tiko ra vha tsha tona ya vha Mokgatlha wa Mphatlalatsi wa WWII. Vhathu va va hlahela ku khotla le mokgatlha wa vha ka tlhafele ya Mphatlalatsi ya Tona, ku khensa ka Mokgatlha wa Vhutswana.
